name: A pair of venomtouched leather moccasins
data: It increases the users dexterity an average amount.
It decreases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users charisma an average amount.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users poison resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
